column5: fished with my buddy today at the toronto islands and he caught 2 bass, me none, pretty bad day fishing wise, really slow, he was using my rod and bait, so we split the honours of holding it, this is one fat mama!   my buddy with the bass      me with the same one      we forgot the weigher at home, but were geussing 6 lbs
Nice Hawg there, def a 5 pound fish maybe more
Awesome pig.  So it was you there eh?  I was the one near there too, remember me?
hey mikeymike, did u give me the leetch?
no i did not give you the leech.  i was that asian guy...  i fished where you fished afterward too...   anyways.
oh yep i remember you, cool, maybe cya out there sometime...
Urby nice pic of the largemouth sounds like you put the newbie on fish and sacrificed your fishing to accomidate your buddy.  MTP

What lure did you use to catch those?  Topwater frog?  Because I seen many bass cruising around and most of them just wouldn't bite even when I had the bait right on it's face.  I think it is because they are guarding their spawn area.  When ever sunfish gets near bass would chase them away.  Yet when I toss'd in a plastic baits bass just ignored it. Totally.  I did end up getting one large one after like 20+ cast to same fish over and over and working on it.  It did finally sucked in my Strike King 3X Zero White stick bait. (I love this bait, i tried to cut off a little bit off the end with my finger and I couldn't because it is so elestic~ yet super soft.  This plastic is just amazing durable and super soft)  I'll upload my pics later.

caught on a 5 inch senko, green and creme, we playing it infront of its face for long time, many casts it took, i think it got fed up of it and picked it up, yes i also noticed their still kinda in gaurd mode...

Congrats on 'your' bass. I accidentally hooked some bass at the islands last week about that size - I don't think they have packed on much weight yet so I would say it is more like 4lbs!  Don't worry I'm sure you'll catch one of your own soon.  Might be out there tomorrow. 007
you could have pulled a BBR and said its your fish. lol just kidding, nice bucket. better luck next time in catching your own fish.
yea the ones i caught in my report were both still on beds, they ignored like four different baits, it was like i was playing a chess match with this fish for two hours.
